channel.title: PortalPkz CUSTOMS SERVER 317 || DRYGORES || ALL CUSTOMS || CUSTOM NPCS ||
channel.description:
Do you love custom servers? Well the staff and players are inviting to try out our rapidly growing custom built server!
We have many custom items such as: Drygor Chaotic Many different coloured Party Hats, Whips, Santa hats and Halloween masks Term Torva Energy Sword Ares Armour Oblitary sword and many more custom weapons!
There are many bosses/ mini game including: Nex Waterfiends (drops Quad XP ring, Double XP ring, Ring of Wealth and even 2b, 1b, 500m and 100m, Caskets) Sea Troll Queen Lakhrahnaz Nomad Giant Sea Snake Avatar Of Destruction Godwars King Black Dragon Dagganoth Kings Corporal Beast
With such a quickly growing server we need more players to maintain the stability in our economy, so the owner of the server (Attack) will be hiring professional staff members. But with all that there is to do on this server you'll have your daily enjoyment with the help of our amazing staff and players of the server, never forget that there is always experienced players to assist you with any difficulties. We hope to see you there!
CLICK BELOW TO DOWNLOAD CLIENT
CLIENT :
Website :
[url=http://portalpkzrsps.weebly.com]Webclient[/url]
[size=14pt]VPS HOSTED 24/7 JOIN NOW [u][b]NOT LEECHED LIKE OTHER SERVERS![/b][/u][/size]
[size=14pt]Owner is Attack[/size]
Pictures :) [b]Some of the customs :[/b]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/39643500cadc1062d22961530a3258e9.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/25eb40bcbfc06f231878368c0b3c7872.png[/img]
Zones : *EXP ZONE (DROPS MYSTERY BOXES)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/86837895a4ebe009768404450177e527.png[/img]
*POINT ZONE (GIVES CUSTOM POINTS)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/d9ca3b3d070407123f08c5a25ffad535.png[/img]
*Point Zone shop (CUSTOM POINTS SHOP)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/c45445271d12b8b9dc838676d6418ab5.png[/img]
*RARE ZONE (HWEENS,PHATS,BUNNIES)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/a660ed065e80ce0b34777fba364c796e.png[/img]
*NARUTO ZONE (DCAPES/CAPES)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/437961b364dbb35d353117c977279107.png[/img]
*JUBSTER ZONE (SWORDS AND MORE)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/6299d7fb922b0e869f41270f80e532a1.png[/img]
*COSMETIC ZONE (GUNS/DILDOS/COLOURED CAPES)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/cdf01d4a125654f82373ca614ac940b4.png[/img]
*SPIRIT ZONE (ALL CUSTOM SPIRIT SHIELDS)
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/d3793dc47d48c9a287d7157e1e15114a.png[/img]
*WATER FIENDS (DOUBLE XP RINGS/ROW/QUADRA XP RINGS)
Videos :

item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Profits, post:10, topic:552313”][quote author=Beemobmo71 link=topic=671230.msg4488992#msg4488992 date=1436201859]
Looks like you leeched GadorX and replaced some of the NPC’s, but used the exact same spots. gj :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm:
[/quote]

WAIT WAIT i leeched gador x? bro gador x owner (Sam) ive known him for 2 years now and if i leeched his rsps im sure he wouldve booted it offline for a long time so stfu get ur facts right

[/quote]
calm your tits.
As Welliton stated, this advertisement thread needs a fudge ton of work done to it before you can expect it to go anywhere. Nevertheless, I wish you luck.

item.description:
@Profits wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:6, topic:552313”]I must be mental, those shit servers always get me to play them. :palm:
sigh but yeah your advertisement could use some work. And perhaps change some locations and add some cool PVM content. (Not just a zone)
I’ve seen this type of server many times, and i wouldn’t be surprised if you just leeched one.

Goodluck never the less.[/quote]

Hey , If its a shit server then easily dont play on it and no its not a leech go search all the internet or play all the rspss if u see one same as mine then il give u my source
